spec_data.Name: perl-Proc-InvokeEditor
spec_data.Description:
This Perl module provides the ability to supply some text to an external text
editor, have it edited by the user, and retrieve the results.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Mon 21 Aug 2017 04:32:28 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Perl extension for starting a text editor
